channel.title: Guys, i need help for making a pic for my client
channel.description:
ok my photo shop is not working on my computer so i would like some help
the url for the pic is here
http://www.bio.umass.edu/biology/conn.river/plant_images/forest2.jpg
On the pic i Would like someone to edit it so it says,
Pk-Forest (in big light green letters)
and underneath it somewhere,
by mattboy (in small light green letters)
the reward might be mod on my forums or on my server, i dunno
thanks
mattboy

item.title: Guys, i need help for making a pic for my client
item.dc:creator: @mattboy mattboy
item.description:
@mattboy wrote:

ok thankyou so much, you can be mod on forums, here the link

www.pkforest.smfforfree2.com

umm, i need you to make it so its backwords so it will work for my client

heres an example:

can u make that??

so the Pk-forest

by mattboy is flipped?
